description: This source file defines a Python module for interacting with the Spoonacular recipe API. It includes a client class that manages making authorized HTTP requests, handling errors, and providing methods to search for recipes and retrieve detailed recipe information.

classes.name: SpoonacularServiceError
classes.description: Base exception for Spoonacular service errors.

classes.name: SpoonacularAuthError
classes.description: Raised when API key is missing or invalid.

classes.name: SpoonacularClient
classes.description: HTTP client for interacting with the Spoonacular API, providing methods for searching recipes and fetching recipe information.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient.__init__
methods.description: Initializes the client with optional API key and timeout parameters.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient._require_key
methods.description: Ensures that an API key is available, raising an error if not.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient._get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the Spoonacular API with error handling.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient.search_recipes
methods.description: Searches for recipes based on query parameters.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient.get_recipe_information
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific recipe.

methods.name: SpoonacularClient get_spoonacular_client()
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of the SpoonacularClient class.

methods.name: None __init__(self, api_key: Optional[str] = None, timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None)
Dict[str,Any] _get(self, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
Dict[str,Any] get_recipe_information(self, recipe_id: int, include_nutrition: bool = False)
Dict[str,Any] search_recipes( self, query: str, number: int = 10, offset: int = 0, diet: Optional[str] = None, cuisine: Optional[str] = None, intolerances: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
ctags.pattern: /^DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = httpx.Timeout(10.0, connect=5.0, read=10.0)  # total, connect, read timeouts$/

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, api_key: Optional[str] = None, timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None) -/
ctags.signature: (self, api_key: Optional[str] = None, timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None)

ctags.name: _get
ctags.pattern: /^    def _get(self, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)

ctags.name: get_recipe_information
ctags.pattern: /^    def get_recipe_information(self, recipe_id: int, include_nutrition: bool = False) -> Dict[st/

ctags.name: search_recipes
ctags.signature: ( self, query: str, number: int = 10, offset: int = 0, diet: Optional[str] = None, cuisine: Optional[str] = None, intolerances: Optional[str] = None, )

fields.name: DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = httpx.Timeout(10.0, connect=5.0, read=10.0)  # total, connect, read timeouts
